explains: adj. 对抗的；对手的，敌手的

sentences.en: In our country there is an adversarial relationship between government and business.
sentences.cn: 在我们的国家，在政府和商界之间存有一种敌对关系。

sentences.en: You’ve heard of our adversarial system of justice?
sentences.cn: 你听说过咱们的对抗式诉讼模式吧？

sentences.en: He also continued to strike an adversarial tone toward BP.
sentences.cn: 他同时也延续了对英国石油公司的不满的语气。
